title: Be My Valentine
clues: Unluckily for Freddie, when Miss Jetson received her card, she thought it was from Adam.
When Molly received her blue colored card, she told Miss Hanson and together they worked out who the card was from. It didn't occur to either of them that it was from Freddie.
The girl who received the red card was convinced it came from Ethan.
Neither Millie nor Miss Motson received a pink card.
